person.persName: John. M. Chevis (Nicholas County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Married to Mary J. Smedley Chevis in Nicholas County on November 15, 1837. Father of Edward T. Chevis, Martha W. Chevis, Alice Chevis and Henry D. Chevis. Merchant in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Postmaster in Nicholas County from July 21, 1852, to 1855. Merchant in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860.
